constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 18/16114/FUL (Excavation of site and erection of 1 x two-bedroom (3 person) and 1 x three-bedroom (4 person) semi-detached dwellings with associated landscaping/amenity space) for changes to doors in North and South elevations and addition of new window to East elevation.
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that the S96A application for a non-material amendment to be granted.

During the course of the application a revised Construction  and Environmental Management Plan (Rev D) was submitted. The RBK Neighbourhood Traffic Engineer and Environmental Health Officer are satisfied with the revised information provided, and recommended that Condition 5 be discharged. As such, Condition 5 (Construction Management Plan) is hereby fully discharged.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:The tree has become severly misshapen without the option for it to be reshaped and is causing damage to property. The tree is not worthy of a TPO and therfore the Council decision should be one of no objection.Recommendation:No objections.
